## Description {#details}

Contains all the state necessary for anti-dep breaking.

Definition at line 40 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/aggressiveantidepbreaker-h">AggressiveAntiDepBreaker.h</a>.

## Private Member Attributes

### DefIndices {#a7b5b44878a3c8bd51838458ec5f6ed35}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::vector&lt;unsigned&gt; llvm::AggressiveAntiDepState::DefIndices</>}>
The index of the most recent complete def (proceeding bottom up), or ~0u if the register is live.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/aggressiveantidepbreaker-h/#l00077">77</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/aggressiveantidepbreaker-h">AggressiveAntiDepBreaker.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### GroupNodeIndices {#a99e6548530387ebf4d1da726cedcd6e7}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::vector&lt;unsigned&gt; llvm::AggressiveAntiDepState::GroupNodeIndices</>}>
For each register, the index of the GroupNode currently representing the group that the register belongs to.

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> 0 is always represented by the 0 group, a group composed of registers that are not eligible for anti-aliasing.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/aggressiveantidepbreaker-h/#l00066">66</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/aggressiveantidepbreaker-h">AggressiveAntiDepBreaker.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### GroupNodes {#afaba3c4975e36e28e0690523f941a99b}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::vector&lt;unsigned&gt; llvm::AggressiveAntiDepState::GroupNodes</>}>
Implements a disjoint-union data structure to form register groups.

A node is represented by an index into the vector. A node can &quot;point to&quot; itself to indicate that it is the parent of a group, or point to another node to indicate that it is a member of the same group as that node.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/aggressiveantidepbreaker-h/#l00060">60</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/aggressiveantidepbreaker-h">AggressiveAntiDepBreaker.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### KillIndices {#a780e217952c6283bde75d4aed214af89}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::vector&lt;unsigned&gt; llvm::AggressiveAntiDepState::KillIndices</>}>
The index of the most recent kill (proceeding bottom-up), or ~0u if the register is not live.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/aggressiveantidepbreaker-h/#l00073">73</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/aggressiveantidepbreaker-h">AggressiveAntiDepBreaker.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
